snippet: A Canadian couple detained in China amid spying allegations made regular trips to deliver goods to North Korea, their close friend and pastor said on Wednesday, and set up a British Columbia-based organization to collect funds for their work....

headline.print_headline: Canadian Couple Set Up Agency to Help Fund North Korean Aid Trips: Friend
headline.main: Canadian Couple Set Up Agency to Help Fund North Korean Aid Trips: Friend

lead_paragraph: A Canadian couple detained in China amid spying allegations made regular trips to deliver goods to North Korea, their close friend and pastor said on Wednesday, and set up a British Columbia-based organization to collect funds for their work.
